sqlMap.select: SELECT FACTID as factid, COMPOSITEID as compositeid, STUDENTID as studentid, SESSIONID as sessionid, GRADEID as gradeid, ORG_NODEID as orgNodeid, ASSESSMENTID as assessmentid, PROGRAMID as programid, CURRENT_RESULTID as currentResultid, REC_LEVELID as recLevelid, SCALE_SCORE as scaleScore, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT as normalCurveEquivalent, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as nationalPercentile, PROFICIENCY_LEVEL as proficiencyLevel, POINTS_ATTEMPTED as pointsAttempted, POINTS_OBTAINED as pointsObtained, POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, TEST_COMPLETION_TIMESTAMP as testCompletionTimestamp FROM TASC_COMPOSITE_FACT WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND COMPOSITEID = #compositeid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TASC_COMPOSITE_FACT ( FACTID, COMPOSITEID, STUDENTID, SESSIONID, GRADEID, ORG_NODEID, ASSESSMENTID, PROGRAMID, CURRENT_RESULTID, REC_LEVELID, SCALE_SCORE, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE, PROFICIENCY_LEVEL, POINTS_ATTEMPTED, POINTS_OBTAINED, POINTS_POSSIBLE, TEST_COMPLETION_TIMESTAMP, SCALE_SCORE_RANGE ) VALUES ( #factid:NUMERIC#, #compositeid:NUMERIC#, #studentid:NUMERIC#, #sessionid:NUMERIC#, #gradeid:NUMERIC#, #orgNodeid:NUMERIC#, #assessmentid:NUMERIC#, #programid:NUMERIC#, decode( sign( NVL(to_number( TO_CHAR( to_timestamp( to_char((select max(test_completion_timestamp) from tasc_composite_fact where sessionid != #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC# and assessmentid = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# and current_Resultid = 1 and compositeid = #compositeid:NUMERIC# ), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS' ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3' ) ), 0) - to_number( TO_CHAR( to_timestamp( #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP# ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3' ) ) ), -1, 1, 0, 2, 1, 2, 1 ), #recLevelid:NUMERIC#, #scaleScore:NUMERIC#, #normalCurveEquivalent:NUMERIC#, #nationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, #proficiencyLevel:NUMERIC#, #pointsAttempted:NUMERIC#, #pointsObtained:NUMERIC#, #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP#, #scaleScoreRangeForProficiency:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TASC_COMPOSITE_FACT SET FACTID = #factid:NUMERIC#, GRADEID = #gradeid:NUMERIC#, NRS_LEVELID = #nrsLevelid:NUMERIC#, ORG_NODEID = #orgNodeid:NUMERIC#, ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC#, PROGRAMID = #programid:NUMERIC#, CURRENT_RESULTID = #currentResultid:NUMERIC#, REC_LEVELID = #recLevelid:NUMERIC#, SCALE_SCORE = #scaleScore:NUMERIC#, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT = #normalCurveEquivalent:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE = #nationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, PROFICIENCY_LEVEL = #proficiencyLevel:NUMERIC#, POINTS_ATTEMPTED = #pointsAttempted:NUMERIC#, POINTS_OBTAINED = #pointsObtained:NUMERIC#, POINTS_POSSIBLE = #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, TEST_COMPLETION_TIMESTAMP = #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP# WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND COMPOSITEID = #compositeid:NUMERIC#

UPDATE TASC_COMPOSITE_FACT fact SET CURRENT_RESULTID = #currentResultid:NUMERIC# WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID != #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND (COMPOSITEID in (select COMPOSITEID from TASC_COMPOSITE_FACT where sessionid = #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC#) OR #currentResultid:NUMERIC# = 1) AND ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# AND test_completion_timestamp = (select max(test_completion_timestamp) from tabe_composite_fact where sessionid != #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC# and compositeid = fact.compositeid and assessmentid = fact.assessmentid and test_completion_timestamp <= decode(#currentResultid:NUMERIC#, 1, sysdate, #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP#))
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TASC_COMPOSITE_FACT WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND COMPOSITEID = #compositeid:NUMERIC#
